Ira C.



Hi there! I’m Ira – software engineer & computer science undergraduate at the University of Massachusetts Boston.

Previously, I worked as a software & research intern at IBM Research in Yorktown, New York, The Center for Brains, Minds, and Machines at MIT, and The Rowland Institute at Harvard University.

Outside of coding, I am passionate about writing, music, and foreign languages!
